event.title: Panel on FRUS and National Security at American Historical Association (AHA) 2011 Annual Meeting

icon.alttext: Still image of AHA CSPAN Event

teaser.div:
“Open Secrets: The Foreign Relations of the United States Series, Democracy’s ‘Need to Know,’ and National Security”
(CSPAN video and Youtube video of a panel at the American Historical Association Annual Meeting)

a.title: Link to CSPAN Video of the AHA Event

img.alt: Still image of AHA CSPAN Event

h3.a: “Open Secrets: The Foreign Relations of the United States Series, Democracy’s ‘Need to Know,’ and National Security”

div.p:
American Historical Association Annual Meeting
January 9, 2011

Two historians from the Office of the Historians participated in a panel at the American Historical Association (AHA) 2011 Annual Meeting, entitled “Open Secrets: The Foreign Relations of the United States Series, Democracy’s ‘Need to Know,’ and National Security”. Video of the event is available via CSPAN video and Youtube video.
